item.title: Predicting March Madness with Machine Learning
item.description: Using logistic regression and random forests to predict the 2021 College Basketball Champion I need to clean this up, limit the code and write some more ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.3 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.1.0 v dplyr 1.0.5 ## v tidyr 1.1.3 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.4.0 v forcats 0.5.1 ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.

item.title: About Josh Thiele
item.description: I value constant professional and personal growth as I continue my education at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln and pursue a career in analytics. These objectives encourage me to challenge myself daily inside and outside the classroom. I am majoring in Actuarial Science with minors in Mathematics, Statistics, and Business Analytics. I am a student in the 6th cohort of the Nebraska Business Honors Academy; this organization focuses on an academically rigorous curriculum, leadership, and community involvement.
